ActCanada Post Corporation Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Letter Mail Regulations
PrecisREGULATIONS AMENDING THE LETTER MAIL REGULATIONS, effective January 11, 2010, which establish the domestic basic letter rate â€“ the rate for sending a letter weighing 30 g or less anywhere in Canada - for the next five years. This five-year pricing plan replaces the price-cap formula that has held increases at one third below the rate of consumer inflation for close to a decade.
